stories.Title: Revelations from a magnetic source
stories.Description: Researchers from Ohio State University have presented a study that changes our understanding of low-mass stars, as they could hide stronger magnetic fields than expected.
stories.Tweet: Revelations from a magnetic source 📦 Researchers from Ohio State University have presented a study that changes our understanding of low-mass stars, as they could hide stronger magnetic fields than expected. #science https://interestingengineering.com/science/low-mass-stars-milky-way-galaxy-magnetic-fields

stories.Title: Breakthrough in Alzheimer's research
stories.Description: Monoclonal antibody donanemab shows encouraging results in slowing disease progression in early-stage patients. While it doesn't improve symptoms, it raises hope for effective treatments.
stories.Tweet: Breakthrough in Alzheimer's research 📦 Monoclonal antibody donanemab shows encouraging results in slowing disease progression in early-stage patients. While it doesn't improve symptoms, it raises hope for effective treatments. #science https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02321-1

stories.Title: A winning bet for Apple
stories.Description: Surpassing Germany and France, India has become a key player in Apple's global iPhone sales. A proven sign that the company's investments in the country have paid off.
stories.Tweet: A winning bet for Apple 📦 Surpassing Germany and France, India has become a key player in Apple's global iPhone sales. A proven sign that the company's investments in the country have paid off. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/18/india-is-now-one-of-apples-top-5-iphone-markets-for-the-first-time.html

stories.Title: Tesla’s self-driving journey
stories.Description: Tesla is allegedly partnering with Samsung for the development of a 4-nanometer self-driving chip for Hardware 5.0. An important step toward autonomous driving, if true.
stories.Tweet: Tesla’s self-driving journey 📦 Tesla is allegedly partnering with Samsung for the development of a 4-nanometer self-driving chip for Hardware 5.0. An important step toward autonomous driving, if true. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/07/18/tesla-rumored-partner-samsung-4-nm-chip-self-driving-hw-5-0/

stories.Title: Ford sparks a price war
stories.Description: Rivian's rise and Tesla's Cybertruck arrival prompted Ford to take action, lowering the prices for its F-150 Lightning electric pickups.
stories.Tweet: Ford sparks a price war 📦 Rivian's rise and Tesla's Cybertruck arrival prompted Ford to take action, lowering the prices for its F-150 Lightning electric pickups. #ford https://apnews.com/article/ford-lightning-electric-tesla-vehicle-msrp-7599a0fceb25ce9974dfe6671f0913fb

stories.Title: Sun-powered drives with Tesla
stories.Description: The new "Charge on Solar" feature allows owners to charge their EVs using excess solar energy. However, it is limited to newer Tesla models and Powerwall users.
stories.Tweet: Sun-powered drives with Tesla 📦 The new "Charge on Solar" feature allows owners to charge their EVs using excess solar energy. However, it is limited to newer Tesla models and Powerwall users. #tesla https://www.engadget.com/teslas-charge-on-solar-lets-powerwall-owners-send-excess-energy-to-their-ev-102018496.html

stories.Title: JAXA and NASA join forces
stories.Description: XRISM is a satellite mission jointly conducted by JAXA and NASA. Scheduled for launch on August 25, it aims to reveal the universe's energetic secrets with its instrument Resolve.
stories.Tweet: JAXA and NASA join forces 📦 XRISM is a satellite mission jointly conducted by JAXA and NASA. Scheduled for launch on August 25, it aims to reveal the universe's energetic secrets with its instrument Resolve. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/xrism-mission-to-study-rainbow-of-x-rays

stories.Title: “Baby Come Back,” and it did!
stories.Description: Rocket Lab's Electron rocket launch not only placed seven smallsats into orbit but also served as a significant test for booster recovery efforts. Ensuring the company's commitment to reusability.
stories.Tweet: “Baby Come Back,” and it did! 📦 Rocket Lab's Electron rocket launch not only placed seven smallsats into orbit but also served as a significant test for booster recovery efforts. Ensuring the company's commitment to reusability. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/electron-launches-seven-smallsats-in-latest-step-towards-reusability/

stories.Title: Mastering prompt engineering
stories.Description: Take a look at GitHub's guide to building LLM-based applications, and dive into the world of AI as the platform shares its experiences and reveals the story behind the success of GitHub Copilot.
stories.Tweet: Mastering prompt engineering 📦 Take a look at GitHub's guide to building LLM-based applications, and dive into the world of AI as the platform shares its experiences and reveals the story behind the success of GitHub Copilot. #ai https://github.blog/2023-07-17-prompt-engineering-guide-generative-ai-llms/

stories.Title: Web design is just one prompt away
stories.Description: With the help of ChatGPT and its own AI tools, Wix has announced its AI Site Generator, enabling users to create entire websites simply by describing their vision.
stories.Tweet: Web design is just one prompt away 📦 With the help of ChatGPT and its own AI tools, Wix has announced its AI Site Generator, enabling users to create entire websites simply by describing their vision. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/17/23796600/wix-ai-generated-websites-chatgpt

stories.Title: Wope: Boost your SEO
stories.Description: This innovative tool allows you to understand rankings, monitor competitors, and unlock insights with the power of AI.
